EmailTemplate.name: 201908_EMEAI_GCC_Event_MC.201908_EMEAI_Guests_Invite_GCC_Event_MC
EmailTemplate.subject: EMEAI Global Customer Committee Meeting
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> You Are Invited TO OUR GCC event Honeywell’s Regional Global Customer Committee It is our pleasure to invite you to the upcoming EMEAI Global Customer Committee Face to Face Meeting, on October 9th and 10th 2019 in Berlin, Germany. The Global Customer Committee (GCC) is an independent group of aerospace professionals that works hand in hand with Honeywell to identify and address key issues facing the business aviation community. The Global Customer Committee's mission is working through a Top 25 action list that is consolidated and prioritized both regionally and globally. Here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Global_Customer_Committee_Agenda_23082019.pdf]]> you will find the High-Level Agenda and a presentation <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/GCC_Presentation_2019.pdf]]> that exemplifies what the GCC is and types of issues that can be addressed at the meeting. Wyndham Garden Berlin Mitte Please book your room by calling +49 30 495 000 3224 and use the code "GCC Fall 2019" Hotel Address: Osloer Strasse 116 a 116A, 13359 Berlin, Germany Rates per Single Room/Night = EUR 89 including breakfast Rates per Double Room/Night = EUR 99 including breakfast If you have any queries or questions, please feel free to contact us at GCC@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:GCC@Honeywell.com]]>
REGISTER HERE <[[https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=JuXsln2csEiNr4uTyQpdGNecg6zo2CZDixhcJWIizzpUMzdSS0dLMUVNMlNSSjQzMUhVUEJJSk42Si4u]]>
We look forward to meeting you!
João Salgueiro GCC EMEAI Chairman Ghiya Al-Haj-Hasan EMEAI Director, Customer & Product Support
